name: AURA BISTRO
address: Progreso 24, Escandón I Secc, 11800 Ciudad de México, CDMX

meals.name: Hamburguesa + Papas o Ensalada
meals.description: Con queso manchego, de cabra, parmesano, oaxaca o provolone, mermelada de cebolla y tocino + papa gajo o ensalada

meals.name: 30% Off Pay de Limón
meals.description: Pay de limón y maracuya

meals.name: Pasta
meals.description: Spaguetti al cilantro con queso provolone y jitomate cherry

meals.name: Wrap + Papas o Ensalada
meals.description: Wrap con aguacate, pepino, quesillo, germen de alfalfa y aderezo de chipotle + papas gajo o ensalada

meals.name: Milanesa + Papas o Ensalada

meals.name: Pepito Arriero

meals.description: Roast beef, salami, manchego, quesillo, jitomate y aguacate...mucho

meals.name: Las Frijoleras
